LanguageData.RQ_QuestDialog: {0} approaches {1} and speaks for a while. While {1} has [PAWN_possessive] own business to attend to, [PAWN_pronoun] tells {0} about a few opportunities [PAWN_pronoun] has heard about while traveling through the area. [PAWN_pronoun] does not have time to attend to everything, and [PAWN_pronoun] offers to share an opportunity in exchange for some silver ({2} total).\n\nWhich one will {0} ask about?
LanguageData.RQ_QuestDialogTwo: {0} writes down a rough map. [PAWN_pronoun] informs {1} how and where to get started.
LanguageData.RQ_LackFundsMessage: Your colony doesn't have enough silver.
